00029 #include "NvElement.h"
00030 
00031 void NvElement::getProfilingData(NvElementProfiler::NvElementProfilerData &data)
00032 {
00033     profiler.getProfilerData(data);
00034 }
00035 
00036 void NvElement::printProfilingStats(std::ostream &out_stream)
00037 {
00038     out_stream << "----------- Element = " << comp_name << " -----------" << std::endl;
00039     profiler.printProfilerData(out_stream);
00040     out_stream << "-------------------------------------" << std::endl;
00041 }
00042 
00043 void NvElement::enableProfiling()
00044 {
00045     profiler.enableProfiling(true);
00046 }
00047 
00048 bool NvElement::isProfilingEnabled()
00049 {
00050     return profiler.enabled;
00051 }
00052 
00053 NvElement::NvElement(const char *name, NvElementProfiler::ProfilerField fields)
00054     :profiler(fields)
00055 {
00056     is_in_error = 0;
00057     if (!name)
00058         is_in_error = 1;
00059     this->comp_name = name;
00060 }
